meanings.definition: Tending to remind one of something.
meanings.sent1: The old house was reminiscent of my childhood home.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh bread is reminiscent of happy memories.
meanings.sent3: The way he danced was reminiscent of a clumsy elephant trying to tiptoe.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was reminiscent of a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The painting was so reminiscent that it brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is reminiscent of someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The antique clock was a reminiscent of the one my grandmother had.
meanings.sent2: The actor's performance was a reminiscent of a famous movie star.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was a reminiscent of a tiny alien visiting from Mars.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden was a reminiscent of a wise old sage.
meanings.sent5: The vintage car was a reminiscent of a bygone era.
